DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate overall remission rate treatment voreloxin Injection patient least 60 year age previously untreated AML
DOC.brief_title: Study Voreloxin Older Patients With Untreated Acute Myeloid Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: Other objective study include : 1 . Safety 2 . Survival 3 . Pharmacokinetics 4 . Evaluate potential biomarkers
DOC.criteria: 1 . At least 60 year age diagnosis previously untreated AML ( either de novo antecedent hematologic disorder therapy relate AML ) 2 . At least 20 % blast BM biopsy aspirate 3 . ECOG performance status 0,1 , 2 4 . Adequate cardiac , renal liver function 1 . Uncontrolled DIC 2 . Active central nervous system involvement AML 3 . Requiring hemodialysis peritoneal dialysis 4 . Some prior history heart attack stroke ( depend long ago event occur )
